thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for a business trip
thread.title_full: Perfect for a business trip - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rob M
title: Perfect for a business trip
text:
Location is not suited to the unloading of a taxi as others have pointed out or the booking of taxi's as there is nowhere for them to stop and wait you need to be there and ready.
That is however a minor inconvenience as the hotel itself is fabulous. The staff are very welcoming and helpful and the room was also everything I need for my trip.
Amble accessible power sockets, fast wifi, strong warm shower and a good breakfast.
Thanks!
